subsection.name: Description
subsection.p: The graphing example demonstrates the integration of SchemaCrawler with JUNG.

ol.li: Install ant , and make sure that ant is on your path.
Copy the SchemaCrawler jar file and schemacrawler.config.properties into the graphing example directory.
Download JUNG , and copy all of the jar files required by JUNG (at least commons collections and colt) into the graphing example directory.
Start the hsqldb server by running runServer.cmd ( runServer.sh on Unix) from the dbserver directory.
Start a command shell in the graphing example directory.
Try modifying the graph size to modify the output.
